name: local-storage-fallback
description: Check and use appropriate storage adapter for browser (localStorage, sessionStorage, cookies, memory)

scripts.build:browser: webpack lib lib/dist.js --output-library=localStorageFallback --output-library-target=umd && webpack lib lib/dist.min.js -p --output-library=localStorageFallback --output-library-target=umd
scripts.prepublish: mkdir -p lib && npm run build:node && npm run build:browser
